translations.translation: Need help with your private databases?
The server is in an idle state. Some features are therefore disabled.
Migrating server. Some features are disabled as a result.
You are not the database administrator.
You do not need a certificate for connecting to your instance. However, it is required if you would like to encrypt the connection to it.
Refer to the users and rights tab
Any changes will result in the server rebooting.
The configuration is being changed. Your server will restart.
An error occurred when modifying the configuration.
An error has occurred while retrieving the data.
Your server has restarted and the configuration was successful.
Defines whether or not auto-commit mode is enabled i.e. if requests have automatically been committed or if they have to be committed in order to work.
Maximum number of authorised simultaneous connections on the server.
Disable the use of InnoDB tables.
This is a directory of temporary files. /dev/shm refers to RAM storage for extra performance, whereas /tmp refers to hard disk storage (recommended for occasional resource-intensive transactions).
The number of seconds of inactivity during a command line connection, after which the server closes the connection.
The number of seconds of inactivity during an external connection, after which the server closes the connection.
Defines whether SQL transactions are automatically submitted or not.
Is used to trigger the execution of requests programmed directly on the MySQL server.
Selected size of memory buffer (in megabytes).
Number of seconds for which the server will wait for activity on an interactive connection before closing the connection.
Number of simultaneous connections authorized on Private SQL.
Number of simultaneous connections authorized per user.
Temporary file folder (RAM or hard disk of the instance).
Time for which the server will wait for activity on a non-interactive connection before closing the connection (in seconds).
This feature is not available for this database type.
Authorisation of the following query: Select
Authorisation of the following queries: Select/Insert/Update/Delete
You do not have a database
You cannot change the rights of a user who is being deleted.
The deletion request has been successful.
An error has occurred submitting the deletion request.
An error has occurred while modifying rights.
The rights have been successfully modified.
The modification will be effective in a few minutes.
The password does not conform to our security rules.
The addition of a user has been registered and will soon be effective.
An error has occurred adding a user

Private SQL is only compatible with web hosting plans based in the same datacentre, such as the one selected. If you would like to use another web hosting plan on your account, or you would like to use a different web hosting plan and you don't know which datacentre it is based in, you can find this information in the "General information" tab of this hosting plan.
Private SQL should be installed in the same datacentre as the hosting plan

Private SQL is only compatible with hosting services in the same datacentre. If you have a hosting plan on another account and don't know which datacentre it is in, log in to your other account and retrieve this information in your web hosting plan's "General information" tab.
Please note, CloudDB is not compatible with OVH web hosting plans.

Attention! The password must conform to the following conditions:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- At least one upper-case letter
- At least one lower-case letter
- At least one number
- Must contain only numbers and letters.
The format of the password is incorrect.
The password change request will be effective in a few minutes.
An error has occurred submitting the password change request.

Attention! The password must conform to the following conditions:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- At least one upper-case letter
- At least one lower-case letter
- At least one number
- Must contain only numbers and letters.

Please note: the name must meet the following criteria:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- Should only contain figures and letters.
- May contain these characters: "-", "_", "."
The format of the password is incorrect.
The password change request will be effective in a few minutes.

As a security measure, we recommend that you do a backup of all your databases before this migration.
Warning! This migration will cause the Private SQL to reboot.
Your server migration request will be processed in a few moments.
An error has occurred submitting the server migration request.
You have no other versions available.
You are about to sync the data with your server.
Your request to sync your data with your server will be processed in a few moments.
An error as occurred submitting the request to sync your data with your server.
You are about to reboot your server.
The server reboot request will be processed in a few moments.
An error has occurred submitting the server reboot request.
You are about to boot your server.
Your server boot request will be processed in a few moments.
An error has occurred submitting the server reboot request.
You are going to turn off your server.
The request to turn off your server will be registered in a few moments.
An error has occurred submitting the request to turn off your server.
Your server has been turned off.
Your data has been synced with your server.
An error has occurred migrating your server.
An error has occurred booting your server.
An error has occurred turning your server off.

No database backups deleted within the last 30 days
Confirm the deletion of the database: {0}
The deletion of the database has been registered.
An error has occurred when deleting the database.
Your database backup request has been processed.
An error has occurred backing up the database.
The name does not follow the conditions.

Please note: the name must comply with the following conditions:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- Must contain only numbers and letters.
The database creation request has been processed.
An error has occurred creating the database.
Between 8 and 31 characters, at least one upper-case letter, one lower-case letter and a number, must only be made up of numbers and letters
You do not yet have an IP address authorised to access your databases. Please enter the IP address of the server for which you would like to grant access to your databases.
IP authorised to access the database
First recreate this in the database management tab.
Do you want to restore the {0} backup for the {1} database?
An error has occurred loading information.
An error has occurred restoring the backup. This error may have occurred because the database does not exist, or because no users have the required rights.
You can only restore an existing database.
A database with the same name already exists. If you decide to continue with the restore, the contents of this database will be deleted and replaced with the chosen backup.

I confirm that I have read and understood the Terms & conditions.
Click "Generate purchase order" to order your private database server.
Please read and confirm the terms and conditions below, then click on "Next":
To confirm your order please click on the "Pay" button below.
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
An error has occurred while generating the purchase order.
The amount of RAM selected will replace the current amount.
The modification will be effective once payment is received.
This will cause the server to restart.
Your purchase order has been successfully generated. The volume of RAM will be modified when you have confirmed it.
An error occurred while creating the order confirmation.
The name must not exceed 250 characters.

The planned backup will be deleted.
An error has occurred deleting the scheduled backup.
The Start SQL solution is not available without a web hosting plan.
You must have a hosting plan in order to get Private SQL and Start SQL options.
CloudDB needs a service that has access to the public network/internet.
Which database service do you want?
Simple, efficient databases for everyday needs involving OVH Web Hosting plan (excludes Cloud Web solutions)
Database size from 100 MB to 800 MB
MySQL 5.5 or 5.6 depending on the datacentre
Maximum of 30 simultaneous connections per database
Warning: same size database packs cannot be combined. If you already have an SQL pack of the same size for this domain, the new pack will replace the old one.
Databases with guaranteed RAM performance for your OVH Web Hosting plan
Only accessible from your OVH web hosting plan
Between 8 GB and 64 GB guaranteed drive space
Works perfectly alongside all of our OVH Cloud products, e.g. VPS, dedicated servers, Public Cloud Instances and Cloud Web hosting
Only accessible from the public network
Between 8 GB and 64 GB guaranteed drive space
